t: Amazon to open first brick-and-mortar storefront in Iowa at Jordan Creek Town Center
s: December 3, 2021 - Amazon, the massive e-commerce retailer based in Seattle, plans to open its first physical storefront in Iowa at Jordan Creek Town Center in West Des Moines.

t: Amazon's new 'last mile' facility in Mason City is open | Cerro Gordo County | kimt.com
s: December 30, 2024 - Photos courtesy of Amazon. ... MASON CITY, Iowa – Amazon says its new “last mile” facility in Mason City is up and running.

t: Mason City is getting a new 50,000 sq/ft Amazon facility
s: The announcement came through a post on the North Iowa Corridor Economic Development Corporation’s (NICEDC) Facebook page. Located near the Avenue of the Saints and Hwy 18, the 50,000 sq/ft facility will help power the last mile of Amazon’s fulfilment process.
